desc.p: Represents the reference number to uniquely identify a particular Tickler user. This ID comprises of two components, the first of which is the Tickler receiver, the one that is assigned the task, followed by a '_' and then appended with the date on which Tickler is scheduled.
Holds the Tickler ID that is relevant to this User schedule.
ID field of EB.TICKLER.USER. System generated table and field.
